CatDescriptText: Mrs. Grace McCormick, 3339 McNeil Place, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 19, 1958, pg. 9 with question: "Do you think that a business recession has hit the United States? If so, how has it affected you?" answer reads: "I think there is.  I was in middle of buying a home and because I could not get enough work, I had to refinance it.  I hope that things become better or otherwise I will have to refinance it again or lose it."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Grace McCormick wearing light colored zippered short sleeve dress with small graphic pattern, dark belt, and hat, standing on sidewalk in Market Square with Oyster House, G.C. Murphy's, and New Diamond Market in background
